publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7670.1 Charlie Gordon: Green Bus Fund Good for Jobs in Camelon—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7670) in the name of Michael Matheson, after "Government" insert ", an idea pioneered by the previous UK Labour government, called for in a Labour MSP’s motion, S3M-5781, submitted on 17 February 2010 and overwhelmingly supported by the Parliament after a debate on Labour’s motion, S3M-5973, on 18 March 2010." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-7670.1 Green Bus Fund Good for Jobs in Camelon (lodged on 11 January 2011) Jackie Baillie*, Michael McMahon*, John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Karen Gillon*, Hugh Henry*

S3M-7670.1 Charlie Gordon: Green Bus Fund Good for Jobs in Camelon—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7670) in the name of Michael Matheson, after "Government" insert ", an idea pioneered by the previous UK Labour government, called for in a Labour MSP’s motion, S3M-5781, submitted on 17 February 2010 and overwhelmingly supported by the Parliament after a debate on Labour’s motion, S3M-5973, on 18 March 2010." Supported by: Jackie Baillie, Michael McMahon, John Park, Dr Richard Simpson, Karen Gillon, Hugh Henry, Sarah Boyack*, David Whitton*, Andy Kerr*, Helen Eadie*, Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Butler*, Mary Mulligan*, Patricia Ferguson*, Rhona Brankin*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-7670.1 Green Bus Fund Good for Jobs in Camelon (lodged on 11 January 2011) Marlyn Glen*
